PLFS.description: Periodic Labour Force Survey (PLFS) provides detailed labour market statistics for India. It captures employment, unemployment, participation, types of employment, hours and days worked, and earnings for different population groups using standard tabulation frames (usual status, current weekly status, etc.). These indicators support policy analysis on job quality, wages, underemployment and sectoral employment patterns.

indicators.name: Labour Force Participation Rate
indicators.description: The proportion of the working-age population (typically 15 years and above) that is either employed or actively seeking employment during the reference period. LFPR measures the size of the economically active population and is expressed as a percentage.

indicators.name: Worker Population Ratio
indicators.description: The percentage of the total population who are employed (i.e., persons who did any work for pay or profit or worked without pay in a household enterprise) in the reference period. WPR indicates the share of people actually engaged in economic activity.

indicators.name: Unemployment Rate
indicators.description: The share of the labour force who are not employed but are available for work and actively seeking employment during the reference period. It is expressed as a percentage of the labour force and signals labour market slack.

indicators.name: Percentage distribution of workers
indicators.description: Breakdown of employed persons across key categories (for example: self-employed, regular wage/salaried, casual labour) or by sector/industry. This distribution highlights the composition and quality of employment.

indicators.name: Percentage of regular wage/ salaried employees in usual status (ps+ss) in non-agriculture sector (NIC-2008 Divisions:05-99)
indicators.description: Proportion of workers in the non-agricultural sectors (NIC-2008 divisions 05–99) who are in regular wage/salaried employment when measured in usual status (principal + subsidiary status). Expressed as a percentage of total workers in those sectors.

indicators.name: Average wage/salary earnings (Rs. 0.00) during the preceding calendar month from regular wage/salaried employment among the regular wage/salaried employees in CWS
indicators.description: Mean monthly earnings (in rupees) from regular wage/salaried employment for those classified as regular salaried employees in the Current Weekly Status (CWS). The reference is the preceding calendar month and captures base wages/salaries (excludes irregular receipts unless specified).

indicators.name: Average wage earnings (Rs. 0.00) per day from casual labour work other than public works in CWS
indicators.description: Average daily wage (in rupees) earned by persons engaged in casual labour outside public works programmes, measured for those in Current Weekly Status. Useful for comparing casual wage levels across regions and sectors.

indicators.name: Average gross earnings (Rs. 0.00) during last 30 days from self-employment among self-employed persons in CWS
indicators.description: Mean gross receipts (in rupees) reported over the last 30 days by self-employed persons (own-account workers, unpaid family helpers, employers) captured in the Current Weekly Status, before deducting business expenses.

indicators.name: Average no. of days worked in a week for workers in CWS
indicators.description: Average number of days worked per week by employed persons as recorded under Current Weekly Status. This indicator captures part-time vs full-time engagement and underemployment.

indicators.name: Average number of hours actually worked per week considering all the economic activities performed during the week for workers in CWS
indicators.description: Mean total hours actually worked in a week across all economic activities for persons employed (CWS). This measures weekly time commitment and is helpful to detect long hours or time poverty.

indicators.name: Average number of hours available for additional work in a week for person with different broad activity status in employment in CWS
indicators.description: Average spare time (hours per week) that employed persons report as available for additional paid work, disaggregated by broad activity status (e.g., self-employed, regular salaried, casual). Indicates potential underemployment or capacity to take extra work.

indicators.name: Average wage earnings (Rs.) per day from casual labour work by industry of work (industry sections of NIC-2008)
indicators.description: Average daily earnings (in rupees) for casual labourers disaggregated by industry (NIC-2008 sections). This allows comparison of casual wage rates across industry groups and informs sectoral wage analysis.

Gender Statistics.description: Gender Statistics indicators capturing demographic trends, fertility, health, education, labour, financial inclusion, political participation, crimes against women, disability, and social empowerment aspects.

indicators.name: Trend in Population
indicators.description: Overall demographic trend showing population growth and changes over time.

indicators.name: Sex Ratio
indicators.description: Number of females per 1,000 males in the population.

indicators.name: Average Annual Growth Rate of Population
indicators.description: Rate of annual growth in total population over a specified period.

indicators.name: Distribution of Rape Victims
indicators.description: forcefully sex ,rape  women, female,girls , india .

indicators.name: Percentage Distribution of Projected Population
indicators.description: Estimated distribution of projected population across age groups and regions.

indicators.name: Sex ratio in context of developmental planning
indicators.description: Sex ratio data considered in policy planning and resource allocation.

indicators.name: State-wise Sex Ratio
indicators.description: Sex ratio disaggregated by states and union territories.

indicators.name: Sex ratio at birth for bigger States based on Sample Registration System
indicators.description: Sex ratio at birth for large states as per SRS estimates.

indicators.name: General Fertility Rate
indicators.description: Number of live births per 1,000 women of reproductive age (15-49 years).

indicators.name: Age-specific Fertility rate
indicators.description: Fertility rate by specific age groups of women.

indicators.name: Total Fertility Rate
indicators.description: Average number of children born to a woman during her reproductive years.

indicators.name: Percentage distribution of live births
indicators.description: Share of live births across demographic groups.

indicators.name: Adolescent Fertility Rates
indicators.description: Birth rate among adolescent women aged 15–19 years.

indicators.name: Age Specific Fertility Rate by level of education of women
indicators.description: Fertility rates by age groups, further classified by women’s educational attainment.

indicators.name: Women's Mean Age at Marriage
indicators.description: Average age of women at the time of marriage.

indicators.name: Year Wise Infant Mortality Rate
indicators.description: Number of deaths of infants (below 1 year) per 1,000 live births across years.

indicators.name: State/UT Wise Infant Mortality Rate
indicators.description: Infant mortality rates disaggregated by state and union territory.

indicators.name: Under-Five Mortality Rates (U5MR)
indicators.description: Number of deaths of children under age 5 per 1,000 live births.

indicators.name: Year Wise Life Expectancy at birth
indicators.description: Average life expectancy at birth across different years.

indicators.name: State/UT wise Life Expectancy at birth
indicators.description: Life expectancy at birth categorized by state/UT.

indicators.name: Life Expectation at age 60
indicators.description: Average life expectancy for individuals at age 60.

indicators.name: Maternal Mortality Ratio
indicators.description: Maternal deaths per 100,000 live births.

indicators.name: Maternity Care Indicators
indicators.description: Indicators related to antenatal, delivery, and postnatal care for women.

indicators.name: Percentage of Births Attended by Skilled Health Personnel
indicators.description: Share of deliveries attended by qualified doctors, nurses, or midwives.

indicators.name: Percentage of married women use any modern method of family planning
indicators.description: Proportion of currently married women using modern contraception methods.

indicators.name: Unmet Need for Family Planning
indicators.description: Percentage of married women who want to delay or stop childbearing but are not using contraception.

indicators.name: Need for Family Planning Satisfied with Modern Methods (Proportion of Women)
indicators.description: Proportion of demand for family planning met through modern contraceptive methods.

indicators.name: Current tobacco use (15 years or above)
indicators.description: Percentage of persons aged 15 years or above currently using tobacco.

indicators.name: Proportion of Adults who are Obese (BMI >= 30.0)
indicators.description: Percentage of adults with body mass index (BMI) greater than or equal to 30.

indicators.name: Number of new HIV infections per 1,000 uninfected population
indicators.description: Incidence of HIV infection per 1,000 uninfected individuals.

indicators.name: Number of PLHIV alive and on ART at the end of January 2025
indicators.description: Total persons living with HIV who are on antiretroviral therapy as of January 2025.

indicators.name: Cases and Deaths due to Acute Diarrhoeal Diseases
indicators.description: Reported cases and deaths caused by acute diarrhoeal diseases.

indicators.name: Cases and Deaths due to Cholera Infection
indicators.description: Reported incidence and mortality due to cholera.

indicators.name: Cases and Deaths due to Enteric Fever (Typhoid) Infection
indicators.description: Reported incidence and deaths due to enteric fever (typhoid).

indicators.name: Cases and Deaths due to Acute Respiratory Infection
indicators.description: Cases and mortality due to acute respiratory infections.

indicators.name: Cases and Deaths due to Neonatal Tetanus Infection
indicators.description: Reported neonatal tetanus infections and related mortality.

indicators.name: Cases and Deaths due to Tetanus Infection
indicators.description: Reported incidence and deaths caused by tetanus (non-neonatal).

indicators.name: Cases and Deaths due to Diphtheria Infection
indicators.description: Cases and mortality caused by diphtheria.

indicators.name: Cases and Deaths due to Whooping Cough infection
indicators.description: Reported cases and deaths caused by pertussis (whooping cough).

indicators.name: Cases and Deaths due to Measles Infection
indicators.description: Incidence and mortality due to measles.

indicators.name: Cases and Deaths due to Viral Hepatitis (All Causes)
indicators.description: Reported hepatitis infections and associated deaths.

indicators.name: Cases and Deaths due to Rabies Infection
indicators.description: Incidence and mortality caused by rabies.

indicators.name: Cases and Deaths due to Pneumonia Infection
indicators.description: Reported pneumonia cases and related deaths.

indicators.name: Cases and Deaths due to Meningococcal Meningitis Infection
indicators.description: Reported cases and mortality due to meningococcal meningitis.

indicators.name: Cases and Deaths due to Syphilis
indicators.description: Incidence and mortality due to syphilis infection.

indicators.name: Cases and Deaths due to Gonococcal Infection
indicators.description: Reported cases and deaths caused by gonococcal infection.

indicators.name: Cases and Deaths due to Chicken Pox
indicators.description: Incidence and deaths due to varicella (chicken pox).

indicators.name: Cases and Deaths due to Encephalitis Infection
indicators.description: Reported encephalitis infections and associated mortality.

indicators.name: Cases and Deaths due to Viral Meningitis Infection
indicators.description: Reported cases and deaths due to viral meningitis.

indicators.name: Cases and Deaths due to Snake Bite
indicators.description: Incidence and mortality due to snake bites.

indicators.name: Women undergone a screening test for cervical cancer and breast cancer (%)
indicators.description: Percentage of women screened for cervical and breast cancers.

indicators.name: Women who have comprehensive knowledge of HIV/AIDS (%)
indicators.description: Percentage of women with complete knowledge about HIV/AIDS transmission and prevention.

indicators.name: Women whose Body Mass Index is below normal and who are overweight or obese
indicators.description: Proportion of women categorized as underweight, overweight, or obese based on BMI.

indicators.name: Ayush Registered Practitioners (Doctors)
indicators.description: Number of doctors registered under AYUSH systems of medicine.

indicators.name: Number of Registered Nurses
indicators.description: Total number of nurses registered in the healthcare system.

ASUSE.description: All-India Survey of Unincorporated Non-Agricultural Enterprises (ASUSE) indicators covering enterprise characteristics, workers, and financial performance.

indicators.name: Estimated Number of Enterprises
indicators.description: Total estimated number of unincorporated non-agricultural enterprises by activity and type.

indicators.name: Estimated Number of Workers
indicators.description: Total estimated number of workers engaged in enterprises, including hired and household workers.

indicators.name: Estimated Gross Value Added (GVA) Per Enterprise
indicators.description: Average gross value added generated per enterprise.

indicators.name: Estimated Gross Value Added (GVA) Per Worker
indicators.description: Average gross value added generated per worker employed in enterprises.

indicators.name: Estimated Annual Emoluments Per Hired Worker
indicators.description: Annual compensation or emoluments paid per hired worker in enterprises.

indicators.name: Estimated Number of Enterprises by Activity
indicators.description: Distribution of enterprises across activities such as manufacturing, trade, services etc.

indicators.name: Estimated Number of Enterprises by Type of Ownership
indicators.description: Distribution of enterprises by ownership categories such as proprietary, partnership, cooperative etc.

indicators.name: Estimated Number of Enterprises by Sector
indicators.description: Distribution of enterprises in rural and urban sectors.

indicators.name: Estimated Number of Enterprises by Type of Accounts Maintained
indicators.description: Enterprises classified by maintenance of accounts - formal, informal or none.

indicators.name: Estimated Number of Enterprises Using ICT
indicators.description: Enterprises using information and communication technology including computers and internet.

indicators.name: Per 1000 Distribution of Enterprises by Registration
indicators.description: Proportion of enterprises registered under different Acts/Authorities.

indicators.name: Per 1000 Distribution of Enterprises by Nature of Operation
indicators.description: Proportion of enterprises by perennial, seasonal, or casual nature.

indicators.name: Per 1000 Distribution of Enterprises by Working Hours
indicators.description: Proportion of enterprises by average daily working hours.

indicators.name: Per 1000 Distribution of Enterprises by Months of Operation
indicators.description: Proportion of enterprises by number of months operated in last 365 days.

indicators.name: State/UT-wise Estimated Number of Enterprises
indicators.description: Estimated number of enterprises across States and Union Territories.

indicators.name: State/UT-wise Estimated Number of Workers
indicators.description: Estimated number of workers across States and Union Territories.

indicators.name: State/UT-wise Estimated GVA Per Enterprise
indicators.description: Average gross value added per enterprise across States and UTs.

indicators.name: State/UT-wise Estimated GVA Per Worker
indicators.description: Average gross value added per worker across States and UTs.

indicators.name: State/UT-wise Estimated Emoluments Per Hired Worker
indicators.description: Average annual emoluments per hired worker across States and UTs.

indicators.name: State/UT-wise Distribution of Enterprises by Activity
indicators.description: Enterprises classified by activity across different States and Union Territories.

indicators.name: State/UT-wise Distribution of Enterprises by Ownership
indicators.description: Enterprises classified by ownership across different States and Union Territories.

ASI.description: Annual Survey of Industries (ASI) indicators covering industrial performance, capital, output, input, workers, and financial aspects.

indicators.name: Number of Factories
indicators.description: Total number of registered factories covered under ASI.

indicators.name: Factories in Operation
indicators.description: Number of factories in operation during the survey period.

indicators.name: Fixed Capital
indicators.description: Value of fixed assets such as land, buildings, plant and machinery.

indicators.name: Physical Working Capital
indicators.description: Value of inventories including raw materials, fuels, and semi-finished goods.

indicators.name: Working Capital
indicators.description: Difference between current assets and current liabilities of factories.

indicators.name: Invested Capital
indicators.description: Total capital invested including fixed and working capital.

indicators.name: Gross Value of Addition to Fixed Capital
indicators.description: Total additions made to fixed assets during the year.

indicators.name: Rent Paid for Fixed Assets
indicators.description: Total rent paid for using fixed assets such as land and buildings.

indicators.name: Outstanding Loan
indicators.description: Total outstanding loans of the factory sector.

indicators.name: Interest Paid
indicators.description: Total interest paid on outstanding loans.

indicators.name: Rent Received for Fixed Asset
indicators.description: Total rent received from leasing fixed assets.

indicators.name: Interest Received
indicators.description: Total interest received from lending or deposits.

indicators.name: Gross Value of Plant & Machinery
indicators.description: Total value of plant and machinery owned.

indicators.name: Value of Product and By-Product
indicators.description: Value of goods and by-products produced.

indicators.name: Total Output
indicators.description: Gross value of output including products and by-products.

indicators.name: Fuels Consumed
indicators.description: Total value of fuels consumed in production.

indicators.name: Materials Consumed
indicators.description: Total value of raw materials consumed in production.

indicators.name: Total Inputs
indicators.description: Value of all inputs consumed including materials and fuels.

indicators.name: Gross Value Added
indicators.description: Gross value added to the economy by the industrial sector.

indicators.name: Depreciation
indicators.description: Consumption of fixed capital during production.

indicators.name: Net Value Added
indicators.description: Gross value added minus depreciation.

indicators.name: Net Fixed Capital Formation
indicators.description: Net increase in fixed capital during the year.

indicators.name: Gross Fixed Capital Formation
indicators.description: Total additions to fixed capital including replacement.

indicators.name: Addition in Stock of Materials, Fuels, Semi Finished Goods, Finished Goods etc.
indicators.description: Net change in stock of inventories during the year.

indicators.name: Addition in Stock of Materials, Fuels etc.
indicators.description: Change in stock of raw materials and fuels.

indicators.name: Addition in Stock of Semi Finished Goods
indicators.description: Change in stock of semi-finished goods.

indicators.name: Addition in Stock of Finished Goods
indicators.description: Change in stock of finished goods.

indicators.name: Gross Capital Formation
indicators.description: Total capital formation including fixed capital and stock changes.

indicators.name: Net Income
indicators.description: Total income after deducting costs and expenses.

indicators.name: Net Profit
indicators.description: Profit after accounting for depreciation, interest, and rent.

indicators.name: Total Number of Persons Engaged
indicators.description: Total number of persons engaged in factories including workers and employees.

indicators.name: Total Number of Workers
indicators.description: Total number of workers engaged directly or indirectly.

indicators.name: No. of Directly Employed Workers
indicators.description: Number of workers directly employed by factories.

indicators.name: No. of Directly Employed Male Workers
indicators.description: Number of male workers directly employed.

indicators.name: No. of Directly Employed Female Workers
indicators.description: Number of female workers directly employed.

indicators.name: No. of Directly Employed Children Workers
indicators.description: Number of child workers directly employed.

indicators.name: No. of Workers employed Through Contractors
indicators.description: Number of workers engaged through contractors.

indicators.name: No. of Employees Other Than Workers
indicators.description: Number of employees other than workers engaged in factories.

indicators.name: No. of Employees Other Than Workers -Supervisory and Managerial
indicators.description: Supervisory and managerial employees engaged in factories.

indicators.name: No. of Employees Other Than Workers -Other Employees
indicators.description: Other non-managerial employees engaged in factories.

indicators.name: Unpaid family members-proprietor etc
indicators.description: Number of unpaid family members or proprietors engaged.

indicators.name: Total Mandays Employed
indicators.description: Total mandays employed by workers and staff during the year.

indicators.name: Wages and Salaries Including Employer's Contribution
indicators.description: Total wages and salaries including employer contributions.

indicators.name: Wages and Salaries Including Bonus
indicators.description: Total wages and salaries including bonuses.

indicators.name: Wages and Salaries
indicators.description: Total wages and salaries paid.

indicators.name: Wages and Salary of Workers
indicators.description: Total wages and salaries of workers only.

indicators.name: Wages and Salary of Supervisory & Managerial Employees
indicators.description: Wages and salaries paid to supervisory and managerial staff.

indicators.name: Wages and Salary of Other Employees
indicators.description: Wages and salaries paid to other non-managerial employees.

indicators.name: Bonus to All Staff
indicators.description: Total bonuses paid to all staff.

indicators.name: Employers' Contribution
indicators.description: Employers' contribution to social security and other funds.

indicators.name: Quantity of Coal Consumed
indicators.description: Total quantity of coal consumed in production.

indicators.name: Value of Coal Consumed
indicators.description: Total value of coal consumed.

indicators.name: Quantity of Electricity Purchased and Consumed
indicators.description: Quantity of electricity purchased and consumed in production.

indicators.name: Value of Electricity Purchased and Consumed
indicators.description: Value of electricity purchased and consumed.

indicators.name: Value of Petroleum Products Consumed
indicators.description: Total value of petroleum products consumed.

indicators.name: Value of Other Fuels Consumed
indicators.description: Total value of other fuels consumed.

indicators.name: Total Value of Fuel Consumed
indicators.description: Gross value of all fuels consumed in production.

indicators.name: Mandays-Workers
indicators.description: Total mandays employed by workers only.

indicators.name: Total Emoluments
indicators.description: Total emoluments paid including wages, salaries, bonuses, and benefits.

indicators.name: Workmen & Staff Welfare Exps
indicators.description: Total expenditure on workmen and staff welfare.
